channel.title: Mopar BG on login screen
channel.description:
dono where to post this so i desided to post here :D
well i was bored and i didnt really like the BG on the login screen of MoparScape, so i desided to create a new 1 and i did. if any 1 wants to use this just right click this image, save as, go to your Mopar file and change the original Mopar JPG to this 1(i know the right half of it is backwards but it will look right when u do it) [img]http://img184.imageshack.us/img184/108/mopar0um.jpg[/img]
heres link http://img184.imageshack.us/img184/108/mopar0um.jpg
after u do that it will look like this [URL=http://img177.imageshack.us/my.php?image=whatitwilllooklike8ve.jpg][IMG]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/7068/whatitwilllooklike8ve.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
~TexasMd91

item.title: Mopar BG on login screen
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

hemeny:

nice man id like to know is that in adope ps?
and howd u make font so coolishly cool 50 billion stars out of 10

yes in adobe ps,

i used defused font from dafont.com (http://www.dafont.com/defused.font) then i put a gradient ,inner shadow, and a 1px white stroke
